mapper.select: SELECT HISTORY_ID AS historyId, USERNAME, SCORE, PLACE_ID AS placeId, RECORDED_DATE AS recordedDate, PLACE_MENU_ID AS placeMenuId FROM HISTORY WHERE HISTORY_ID = #{historyId}
SELECT HISTORY_ID AS historyId, USERNAME, SCORE, PLACE_ID AS placeId, RECORDED_DATE AS recordedDate, PLACE_MENU_ID AS placeMenuId FROM HISTORY WHERE USERNAME = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HISTORY (HISTORY_ID, USERNAME, SCORE, PLACE_ID, RECORDED_DATE, PLACE_MENU_ID) VALUES (SEQUENCE_History.nextval, #{username}, 0, #{placeId}, SYSDATE, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT PLACE_MENU_ID AS placeMenuId FROM HISTORY WHERE USERNAME = #{username} ORDER BY RECORDED_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
